targets.expr: sum(max by(accountId, status) (last_over_time(pipeline_executions_gauge{cluster="$cluster", environment="$env", status!~"QUEUED", accountId=~"$accountId"}[5m])))

panels.title: Total Running Pipeline Executions by Account
Pipeline Completion Count in last 10 mins Across Accounts

targets.expr: topk(10, sum by(accountId) (max by(accountId, status) (last_over_time(pipeline_executions_gauge{accountId=~"$accountId", environment="$env", cluster="$cluster", status!~"QUEUED"}[5m]))))

panels.title: Running Pipeline Executions By Account ID (Top 10)

targets.expr: topk(10, sum by(stepType) (max by(stepType, module) (last_over_time(node_execution_active_count_per_module_and_stepType{cluster="$cluster", environment="$env", stepType!~"NG_SECTION|NG_SECTION_WITH_ROLLBACK_INFO|STAGES_STEP|PIPELINE_SECTION|APPROVAL_STAGE|NG_SECTION_STEP|NG_SPEC_STEP|DEPLOYMENT_STAGE_STEP|IntegrationStageStepPMS|CISPECPMS|NG_EXECUTION|NG_FORK|COMBINED_ROLLBACK_OPTIONAL_CHILD_CHAIN|ROLLBACK_OPTIONAL_CHILD_CHAIN|CUSTOM_STAGE|STEP_GROUP|STRATEGY"}[10m]))))

panels.title: Total Running Steps Per StepType Across Accounts
Completed Steps by Status in Last 10 mins Across Accounts

targets.expr: sum by(accountId) (rate(plan_creation_time_sum{environment="$env", cluster="$cluster", accountId=~"$accountId"}[5m])) / sum by(accountId) (rate(plan_creation_time_count{environment="$env", cluster="$cluster", accountId=~"$accountId"}[5m]))

panels.title: Total Running CI Stages Across Accounts

targets.expr: topk(10, sum by(stepType) (max by(stepType, module) (last_over_time(node_execution_active_count_per_module_and_stepType{cluster="$cluster", environment="$env", stepType!~"NG_SECTION|NG_SECTION_WITH_ROLLBACK_INFO|STAGES_STEP|PIPELINE_SECTION|APPROVAL_STAGE|NG_SECTION_STEP|NG_SPEC_STEP|DEPLOYMENT_STAGE_STEP|IntegrationStageStepPMS|CISPECPMS|NG_EXECUTION|NG_FORK|COMBINED_ROLLBACK_OPTIONAL_CHILD_CHAIN|ROLLBACK_OPTIONAL_CHILD_CHAIN|CUSTOM_STAGE|STEP_GROUP|STRATEGY", module="ci"}[5m]))))
